title: What is the synonym of unique? - Quora

response.answer_text: unique - adjective. existing as the only one or as the sole example; singly; solitary in type or characteristics. an unique copy of ancient manuscript. having no like or equal; un parallled; in comparable. Bose was unique in his handling of counter point. limited in occurrence to a given class, situation, or area. A species unique to Australia. limited to a single outcome or result; without alternative possibilities Certain types of problems have unique solutions. Not typical; unusual. She has a very unique smile. Synonyms:alone; singular; different; exclusive; particular; rare; uncommon; individual; lone; one; one and only; onliest; only; separate; solitary; solo; one of a kind; without equal; exceptional; extraordinary; rare ; exceptional; extraordinary.
